name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior JavaScript Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in building and optimizing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial domains. Expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, **Node.js**, and front-end technologies such as **HTML5** and **CSS3**. Proficient in modern web development practices including **microservice architecture**, **Gulp**, **Webpack**, and **Behavior-Driven Development**. 
Demonstrated success in developing scalable solutions that enhance user experience and meet stringent industry standards. Skilled in deploying solutions using cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside implementing CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes. Adept at building AI/ML-driven platforms with frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 requirements. Strong foundational experience in MLOps, focusing on model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
